@cindygoddard37 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog You totally bit my words! What a loser! Find your own argument instead of stealing my words!!
Totally pathetic! I'm from Odessa you pos, so don't presume to know anything about me or my life, you total worthless waste if oxygen! You are a supporter of your own demented lies! Go!

@vampyregrrl66 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog Omg you apparently don't know what's happening in the world. Your bliss and your stupidness. People are dying. You don't live there so you don't get this. I have friends and family in Ukraine. You are obviously a Trump supporter good luck with that

@bethanylindsay People actually believe Putin is fighting for humanity.
Deprogramming is needed around the world stat. https://t.co/hyDkVxNMUB
@cindygoddard37 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog It's okay just remember when your freedom is gone that some tried to warn you. I hear ignorance is bliss. Enjoy. That is all.

@Capricious_BB @vampyregrrl66 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog Now this a real war happening. Tell that to the parents who have had there kids killed. Shows your true colours. Don't care about anyone but yourself. So selfish
@cindygoddard37 @vampyregrrl66 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog Wow that’s dumb. What is “the right thing,” and how does “not doing it” negate their rights???
@vampyregrrl66 @bethanylindsay @LynnParkPDog Go to to Ukraine and find out what real freedom's look like when they are gone.
